# Whats New Docs

> Documentation for Whats New Docs.

*Topics available: 20*

- [What's new in .NET 5](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-5.md): Learn about .NET 5, a cross-platform and open-source development platform that is the next evolution of .NET Core.
- [What's new in .NET 6](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-6.md): Learn about the new features introduced in .NET 6.
- [What's new in .NET 7](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-7.md): Learn about the new features introduced in .NET 7.
- [What's new in .NET Core 2.0](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-core-2-0.md): Learn about the new features found in .NET Core.
- [What's new in .NET Core 2.1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-core-2-1.md): Learn about the new features found in .NET Core 2.1.
- [What's new in .NET Core 2.2](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-core-2-2.md): Learn about the new features found in .NET Core 2.2.
- [What's new in .NET Core 3.0](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-core-3-0.md): Learn about the new features found in .NET Core 3.0.
- [What's new in .NET Core 3.1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-core-3-1.md): Learn about the new features found in .NET Core 3.1.
